column1: LN912 THORNE JUNCTION TO GILBERDYKE JUNCTION
Services approaching Goole with an extendeddwell (greater than 2 minutes)
Up freight arriving into Goole LoopApproaching Goole

column2: 10 trains from Doncaster, Hull Leeds and Sheffield.  Must be replatformed

column1: RestrictionsFreight trains must not be timed to pass each other over Goole Swing Bridge.  The following two margins shouldtherefore applyUp Freight passes Goole same time as Down freight passes GooleDown Freight passes Goole 10 minutes before Up Freight passes Goole
LN914 HULL TO SEAMER WEST JUNCTION

column2: 1 Trains arriving Hull 0730 – 0900 weekdays, or departing Hull 1600 – 1800weekdays
